Title: Relates to qualified energy storage systems
Summary: Relates to qualified energy storage systems; authorizes energy storage permitting under the office of renewable energy siting and electric transmission.
LawCode: Amd §§66-r, 137, 140 & 145, Pub Serv L; amd §224-d, Lab L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public service law and the labor law, in relation to qualified energy storage systems
